languages.text: {n}На троне восседает ваша точная копия, зловещий двойник, выползший в реальность из зазеркалья. {mf|Его|Ее} глаза встречаются с вашими, и мир начинает резко расширяться, одновременно придавливая вас неподъемным ощущением собственной ничтожности. Откуда-то издалека, через толщу миллионов световых лет, сквозь эти глаза на вас взирает бог. Он видит вас и он голоден. Неутолимо, неуемно голоден.{/n}

{n}An exact copy of you sits on the throne, a sinister double, crawled into this reality from behind the looking glass. {mf|His|Her} gaze meets yours, and the world expands sharply, crushing you with an overwhelming sense of your own insignificance. From somewhere far away, across millions of light years, a god is looking at you through those eyes. He sees you and he is hungry — insatiably, unquenchably so.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}На троне восседает ваша точная копия, зловещий двойник, выползший в реальность из зазеркалья. {mf|Его|Ее} глаза встречаются с вашими, и мир начинает резко расширяться, одновременно придавливая вас неподъемным ощущением собственной ничтожности. languages.text: {n}Hay una copia exacta de ti sentada en el trono, un doble siniestro venido a esta realidad desde el otro lado del espejo. Su mirada se clava en la tuya y el mundo se ensancha, aplastándote con una sensación abrumadora de tu propia insignificancia. Desde millones de años luz, un dios te mira a través de esos ojos. Te ve y te observa con un hambre insaciable e infinita.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}An exact copy of you sits on the throne, a sinister double, crawled into this reality from behind the looking glass. {mf|His|Her} gaze meets yours, and the world expands sharply, crushing you with an overwhelming sense of your own insignificance. From somewhere far away, across millions of light years, a god is looking at you through those eyes. He sees you and he is hungry — insatiably, unquenchably so.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Hay una copia exacta de ti sentada en el trono, un doble siniestro venido a esta realidad desde el otro lado del espejo. Su mirada se clava en la tuya y el mundo se ensancha, aplastándote con una sensación abrumadora de tu propia insignificancia. Desde millones de años luz, un dios te mira a través de esos ojos. Te ve y te observa con un hambre insaciable e infinita.{/n}

languages.text: {n}あなたそっくりのコピーが王座に座っている。不吉なドッペルゲンガーが、覗き窓の向こうからこの現実に這い出してきたのだ。{mf|彼|彼女}の視線と視線が重なり、世界は鮮明に広がり、自分がちっぽけなことを痛感する。何百万光年も離れたどこか遠くから、神がその目を通してこちらを見ている。自分を見て、腹を空かせているのだ…どこまでも、抑えられないほどに。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}An exact copy of you sits on the throne, a sinister double, crawled into this reality from behind the looking glass. {mf|His|Her} gaze meets yours, and the world expands sharply, crushing you with an overwhelming sense of your own insignificance. From somewhere far away, across millions of light years, a god is looking at you through those eyes. He sees you and he is hungry — insatiably, unquenchably so.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたそっくりのコピーが王座に座っている。不吉なドッペルゲンガーが、覗き窓の向こうからこの現実に這い出してきたのだ。{mf|彼|彼女}の視線と視線が重なり、世界は鮮明に広がり、自分がちっぽけなことを痛感する。何百万光年も離れたどこか遠くから、神がその目を通してこちらを見ている。自分を見て、腹を空かせているのだ…どこまでも、抑えられないほどに。{/n}

languages.text: {n}王座上坐着一个和你一模一样的人，仿佛一个邪恶的复制品从镜子后面爬到了真实世界。{mf|他|她}目光与你的目光交汇，随后整个世界急剧膨胀起来。你感到自己渺小不堪，这种感觉几乎要将你压垮。在遥远的地方，几百万光年之外，有一位神明正通过这个冒牌货的双眼看着你。他看到了你，他感到饥肠辘辘，他的饥渴不可遏制、无法满足。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}An exact copy of you sits on the throne, a sinister double, crawled into this reality from behind the looking glass. {mf|His|Her} gaze meets yours, and the world expands sharply, crushing you with an overwhelming sense of your own insignificance. From somewhere far away, across millions of light years, a god is looking at you through those eyes. He sees you and he is hungry — insatiably, unquenchably so.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}王座上坐着一个和你一模一样的人，仿佛一个邪恶的复制品从镜子后面爬到了真实世界。{mf|他|她}目光与你的目光交汇，随后整个世界急剧膨胀起来。你感到自己渺小不堪，这种感觉几乎要将你压垮。在遥远的地方，几百万光年之外，有一位神明正通过这个冒牌货的双眼看着你。他看到了你，他感到饥肠辘辘，他的饥渴不可遏制、无法满足。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Eine exakte Kopie deiner selbst sitzt auf dem Thron, {mf|ein düsterer Doppelgänger|eine düstere Doppelgängerin}, von hinter dem Spiegel in diese Realität gekrochen. {mf|Sein|Ihr} Blick begegnet dem deinen, und die Welt erweitert sich schlagartig, erdrückt dich mit einem überwältigenden Gefühl deiner eigenen Bedeutungslosigkeit. Von irgendwo weit, weit entfernt, über Millionen von Jahren hinweg, blickt ein Gott dich durch diese Augen hindurch an. Er sieht dich und er ist hungrig — unstillbar, unersättlich hungrig.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}An exact copy of you sits on the throne, a sinister double, crawled into this reality from behind the looking glass. {mf|His|Her} gaze meets yours, and the world expands sharply, crushing you with an overwhelming sense of your own insignificance. From somewhere far away, across millions of light years, a god is looking at you through those eyes. He sees you and he is hungry — insatiably, unquenchably so.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Eine exakte Kopie deiner selbst sitzt auf dem Thron, {mf|ein düsterer Doppelgänger|eine düstere Doppelgängerin}, von hinter dem Spiegel in diese Realität gekrochen. {mf|Ihr|Sein} Blick begegnet dem deinen, und die Welt erweitert sich schlagartig, erdrückt dich mit einem überwältigenden Gefühl deiner eigenen Bedeutungslosigkeit. Von irgendwo weit, weit entfernt, über Millionen von Jahren hinweg, blickt ein Gott dich durch diese Augen hindurch an. Er sieht dich und er ist hungrig — unstillbar, unersättlich hungrig.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Le trône est occupé par votre sosie, un sinistre double qui s'est extrait de la réalité par-delà le miroir. Lorsque vos regards se croisent, le monde autour de vous se dilate brusquement et vous fait prendre conscience de votre propre insignifiance. Quelque part loin d'ici, à des millions d'années-lumière, un dieu vous regarde à travers ces yeux. Il vous observe et il a faim. Très faim.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}An exact copy of you sits on the throne, a sinister double, crawled into this reality from behind the looking glass. {mf|His|Her} gaze meets yours, and the world expands sharply, crushing you with an overwhelming sense of your own insignificance. From somewhere far away, across millions of light years, a god is looking at you through those eyes. He sees you and he is hungry — insatiably, unquenchably so.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le trône est occupé par votre sosie, un sinistre double qui s'est extrait de la réalité par-delà le miroir. Lorsque vos regards se croisent, le monde autour de vous se dilate brusquement et vous fait prendre conscience de votre propre insignifiance. Quelque part loin d'ici, à des millions d'années-lumière, un dieu vous regarde à travers ces yeux. Il vous observe et il a faim. Très faim.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Senin birebir aynın, aynanın arkasından bu gerçekliğe geçmiş meşum bir ikizin tahtta oturuyor. Bakışları seninkilerle buluşuyor, dünya aniden genişliyor ve ezici bir önemsizlik hissi tüm benliğini kaplıyor. Bu gözlerle uzaklardan, milyonlarca ışık yılı öteden bir tanrı bakıyor. Seni görüyor. Aç. Yatıştırılamaz, dindirilemez bir açlık duyuyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}An exact copy of you sits on the throne, a sinister double, crawled into this reality from behind the looking glass. {mf|His|Her} gaze meets yours, and the world expands sharply, crushing you with an overwhelming sense of your own insignificance. From somewhere far away, across millions of light years, a god is looking at you through those eyes. He sees you and he is hungry — insatiably, unquenchably so.{/n}
